short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Identify high-value prospects from across the Internet and integrate them into your Intentium database and workflow.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The First and Only Real-Time Intent Relevancy Engine for B2B Sales and Marketing.  Intentium offers the first and only Real-Time Intent Relevancy Engine designed exclusively for B2B Sales and Marketing Companies. Our engine acts as your guide, navigating vast amounts of data to surface the most actionable intent signals. Intentium helps to uncover hidden opportunities, identify high-value prospects, and personalize marketing efforts for maximum impact.
